function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Concealment of information by governments","Impact":"Increased public risk due to lack of transparency","Mitigation":"Improving transparency in government communication and information disclosure","Technologies":"Data management and communication tools for efficient information sharing","People":"General public","Owner":"Government, public communication agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of consensus in expert judgments","Impact":"Inaccurate probability assignment for consequences and suboptimal decision-making","Mitigation":"Establishing a consensus among experts through comprehensive research and analysis","Technologies":"Collaboration platforms for expert discussions and data sharing","People":"Risk assessment experts, decision-makers","Owner":"Expert communities, research institutions"},{"Description":"Interdisciplinary challenges in risk assessment","Impact":"Ineffective analysis of public health risks due to limited perspectives","Mitigation":"Fostering collaboration between specialists in different disciplines and promoting evidence-based analysis","Technologies":"Interdisciplinary research platforms and data integration tools","People":"Specialists in life and social sciences, public health, biomedicine","Owner":"Academic and research institutions"}]}
